DOC.brief_summary: The European Resuscitation Council ( ERC ) 2010 cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) guideline suggest intubators able secure airway without interrupt chest compression . We examine performance Berci-Kaplan DCI ( BERCI ) , GlideScope ( GVL ) , AirTraq , Pentax AWS ( Pentax ) Miller laryngoscope ( MIL ) endotracheal intubation ( ETI ) pediatric resuscitation without chest compression .
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent participate study minimum 1 year work experience emergency medicine experience emergency medicine personnel ( physician , nurse , paramedic ) meet criterion wrist low back disease
